|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = IC+;IP175C; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:1A:C1 |oui = 00:1A:C1

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTA-151G_V01" and "ENG-d06-0601R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device appears to be identical (besides the switch to AR2316A for '''SuperG''') to the [[3Com 3CRWER200-75|3CRWER200-75]].
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC manual.
The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''3Com''' branded '''DVE''' DSA-0151A-12 A w/ '''3Com''' model 3C16760(7900-000-080) (100-120VAC ~ 50/60 Hz, 0.4A -> 12VDC, 1.25A).
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing DD-WRT=== <s>[[dd-wrt-wiki:Supported Devices#3com|Supported]]</s>, was on the supported list at one time.
Quit difficult to enable redboot on Ethernet connection!
Supported by dd-wrt as of = WIP - 3CRWER100 v.24 pre sp2 - build ?
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/3com/3com_3crwer100-75 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/3com/3crwer100_75 |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?pid=304399 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath25 |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 14.07 |current_supported_version = 14.07 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
